articles.description: Follow action from Wednesday's four games in the Premier League including Arsenal v Spurs, Everton v Aston Villa, Newcastle v Wolves.

articles.description: Arsenal come back from a goal down to beat north London rivals Tottenham and close the gap on Premier League leaders Liverpool.
articles.title: Arsenal 2-1 Tottenham Hotspur: Gunners close gap on Liverpool with derby win

articles.description: Alexander Isak continues his superb form with two goals and an assist as an in-form Newcastle beat Wolves.
articles.title: Newcastle United 3-0 Wolverhampton Wanderers: Alexander Isak scores again as Magpies equal club record

articles.description: David Moyes' return to Everton is ruined by Ollie Watkins' second-half winning goal for Aston Villa in the Premier League.
articles.title: Everton 0-1 Aston Villa: David Moyes' return ruined by Ollie Watkins winner in Premier League

articles.title: Pep Guardiola: A clearer picture of Man City boss, his family life & the media

articles.description: Novak Djokovic surpasses Roger Federer's all-time record for the most major singles matches played as he reaches the Australian Open third round.

articles.description: Two-time Australian Open champion Naomi Osaka says she took out a "little revenge" after coming back to beat Czech 20th seed Karolina Muchova.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Naomi Osaka takes 'little revenge' to reach third round

articles.description: Mohamed Salah set for big Saudi offer, Arsenal have two attacking targets in their sights and Napoli eye a double raid on Manchester United.
